_header: Always to say sooth thou shalt never come forth
_description: On speaking the truth — two long couplets

BodRawD328.Transcription:
All way to say sothe þu shalt neuer comforetheAnd all way to lee
                    þu schalt neuer y theSumtyme to lee and sumtyme to say sotheThan
                    þu schalt comforth as other men dothe
BodRawD328.Note:
Translating, ‘Semper veritate discere…’ (4
                    lines), which follows; both the English and the Latin repeated at bottom of page
                    by another hand.
